Comments_List: I gained a deeper appreciation for the historical trajectory of American Judaism and the theoretical issues at stake in assessing that history.

The course is well-organized around various topics. There could have been more of a sense of historical development, but Dr. Stern made it clear that the purpose of the course was to engage theoretical issues, which would be a historical exercise, but not a historicist narrative.
I would absolutely recommend the course to any student interested in expanding their understanding of American Judaism while critically reflecting on the Jewish present.
